title: James Lindsay on His Lifetime Twitter Ban
itunes:author: New Discourses
itunes:summary:
The New Discourses Podcast with James Lindsay, Episode 89 

Twitter finally dropped the hammer and banned James Lindsay. In this episode of the New Discourses Podcast, James spends half an hour telling the story behind the ban and walking through his initial thoughts and reactions to it. Join him to begin the process of questioning the very logic of social media and the tyranny it enables.

Support New Discourses: https://newdiscourses.com/support/

Follow James Lindsay: https://linktr.ee/conceptualjames

Subscribe to New Discourses on other platforms: https://newdiscourses.com/subscribe
